title: Bayesian Optimization Parameter Tuning Framework for a Lyapunov Based Path Following Controller
summary: Parameter tuning in real-world experiments is constrained by the limited evaluation budget available on hardware. The path-following controller studied in this paper reflects a typical situation in nonlinear geometric controller, where multiple gains influence the dynamics through coupled nonlinear terms.
